name: millionairess
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a woman who has money, property, etc. that is worth at least 1,000,000 dollars, pounds, euros, etc.: At twenty she is already a dollar millionairess four times over. Compare
millionaire
More examplesFewer examplesThe young millionairess is very sensible with her money.Although I'm a millionairess, money is not my driving force.A glamorous millionairess has struck up a bizarre relationship with a beggar living in her garden.We have a pitifully small number of female MPs, company directors, and millionairesses.
